item.description: WALK AND LUNCH at Sessions Woods in Burlington at 11 am. This is a beautiful place with streams, a beaver dam, and a waterfall. Join us for a great day outdoors in the sunshine. Afterward, we'll go for lunch at a local restaurant. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to hike: I-84W Exit 38 (Rt. 6 Bristol), go about 6-7 miles (pass Home Depot, several small malls, Stop & Shop, then Blockbuster), at RR tracks, turn right onto Burlington Ave. (Rt. 69), continue on Burlington Ave. for 3.7 miles, turn left at the sign for Sessions Woods Wildlife Area. Go up hill, parking on left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the parking lot next to the cherry red Sebring Crysler convertibile.
item.why: This is a good way to be outdoors and meet other singles.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Walk and Lunch
